Welcome to Tafuta

Tafuta is a platform that allows you to find items that you have lost or report items that you have found.

You can also view items that have been reported as lost or found.

Report List

Create an account, fill in details of items, filter then Connect with your lost item, itâ€™s that easy and quick

Our Process

Click on the report button to report an item that you have lost or found.

Fill in the details of the item that you have lost or found.

Click on the list button to view items that have been reported as lost or found.
